about.title: About me
about.p1: Moin from Bremen. I have explored programming on and off, but now I have dedicated 100% of my focus to it. As an aspiring fullstack developer, I value clear structures.
about.p2: I am looking for a team where I can contribute and grow. Whether as a Junior or in another entry level role, my goal is to actively support and offer real value.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Putting knowledge into practice: Selected projects on my path to becoming a fullstack developer. Click for details, feedback is welcome.

contact.title: Let's talk
contact.lead: Whether it's a job opening or feedback tell me shortly what's on your mind.
contact.sublead: I'll reply promptly and look forward to connecting.

consent.suffix: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

intro.purpose: This website is a private, non-commercial online portfolio created solely for application purposes.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: The content of this website has been created with the utmost care. However, I cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the content. As the operator of this site, I am responsible for my own content in accordance with general laws, but I am not obliged to monitor third-party information provided or stored here or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.

links.title: Liability for Links
links.text: This site contains links to external websites. I have no influence on the content of those websites and therefore cannot assume any liability for them. The respective provider or operator of the linked pages is always responsible for their content.

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.text: The content and works created by me on this website are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, editing, distribution, or any use outside the limits of copyright law requires my written consent.

general.title: General Information
general.text: Protecting your personal data is important to me. This website is a private, non-commercial portfolio and complies with applicable data protection regulations (GDPR).

responsible.title: Controller
responsible.text: The controller responsible for data processing on this website is:

hosting.title: Hosting via GitHub Pages
hosting.text: This website is hosted on GitHub Pages (GitHub, Inc., 88 Colin P Kelly Jr St, San Francisco, CA 94107, USA). When accessing the site, GitHub automatically collects technical information (e.g., IP address, browser type, operating system, access time). This data is processed to ensure security and stability and is automatically deleted after a short period. Data may be transferred to the USA. GitHub has committed to EU data protection standards (including the EU US Data Privacy Framework).

formspree.title: Contact Form via Formspree
formspree.text: For my contact form, I use the service Formspree (Formspree, Inc., 340 S Lemon Ave #4133, Walnut, CA 91789, USA). When you submit the form, the data you enter (such as name, email address, and message) will be processed and securely transmitted to my IONOS email address. Formspree may temporarily log technical data (e.g., IP address, browser type, timestamp) to ensure reliable operation and prevent misuse. Data may be transferred to servers in the USA. Formspree states that it complies with applicable data protection standards, including the EU-US Data Privacy Framework.

purpose.title: Purpose of Processing
purpose.text: The sole purpose of processing your personal data is to respond to your inquiries and enable communication with you. Your data will not be used for marketing purposes.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.text: I store your data only as long as necessary to respond to your inquiry or as required by law. Afterwards, the data will be deleted.

rights.title: Your Rights

items.access: Request access to your stored data

rights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact me by email.

security.title: Data Security
security.text: Please note that data transmission over the internet (e.g., email or form submission) may have security gaps. Complete protection against access by third parties is not possible. However, I take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data.
